name: Shell Side Arm
description: You fire acidic ooze from your side-arm. Make a ranged attack on a creature in range, doing 2d8 + MOVE poison damage on a hit. On a hit, the target makes a CON save, becoming poisoned on failure.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
